1. OpenAI beats Elon Musk's Grok in AI chess tournament  BBC
  2. OpenAI's o3 Crushes Grok 4 In Final, Wins Kaggle's AI Chess Exhibition Tournament  Chess.com
  3. Elon Musk Takes on Sam Altman, This Time Over the Chessboard  Bloomberg.com
  4. World’s top chatbots compete in first-ever AI chess tournament  VnExpress International
  5. Magnus Carlsen roasts Elon Musk’s Grok 4 as it gets humbled by OpenAI’s o3 in chess tournament  The Indian Express

item.title: OpenAI’s latest step towards advanced artificial intelligence - The Economist
item.description:
1. OpenAI’s latest step towards advanced artificial intelligence  The Economist
  2. Introducing GPT-5  OpenAI
  3. The latest ChatGPT is supposed to be ‘PhD level’ smart. It can’t even label a map  CNN
  4. Many ChatGPT users were upset when an older version of the AI chatbot was removed after the release of a new model. The hosts of "Hard Fork" discuss the criticism and what it indicates about the deepening emotional relationships that people are forming wi  Facebook
  5. GPT-5 Backlash + Perplexity C.E.O. Aravind Srinivas on the Browser Wars + Hot Mess Express  The New York Times
